channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 法新社撤回英国凯特王妃手术后的首张官方照片，因发现照片被篡改。肯辛顿宫发布的照片显示，威尔士王妃面带微笑，与孩子们坐在花园的椅子上。
item.description:
AFP withdraws first official photo of UK's Princess Kate post-surgery after image found to have been manipulated

The photo released by Kensington Palace shows the smiling Princess of Wales sitting on a garden chair with her childrenhttps://t.co/Wms46wbrN6 pic.twitter.com/2l5eD5uTrD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: #小罗伯特-唐尼（Robert Downey Jr）凭借《奥本海默》（Oppenheimer）获得奥斯卡最佳男配角。
item.description:
#BREAKING Robert Downey Jr wins best supporting actor for "Oppenheimer" at the #Oscars pic.twitter.com/X9O9aMyl2T

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: "秋天的剖析》让贾斯蒂娜-特里埃在国际上声名鹊起，为这位法国导演赢得了一连串奖项，并最终获得了奥斯卡最佳原创剧本奖 #奥斯卡奖
item.description:
"Anatomy of a Fall" has propelled Justine Triet to international fame, winning a string of awards for the French director, culminating in an Oscar for best original screenplay https://t.co/D6TS7RJuLK#Oscars pic.twitter.com/ildf8T99Oi

Hollywood's top stars hit the #Oscars red carpet at the Dolby Theatre, with a few usual trends on offer: black is always chic and metallics are super glam https://t.co/QMaUYCypnC pic.twitter.com/xnxgOv6I5t

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯和其他中东国家宣布，穆斯林神圣的斋月将于周一开始，而加沙的毁灭性战争给该地区的节日活动蒙上了一层长长的阴影。
item.description:
The Muslim holy fasting month of Ramadan will begin on Monday, Saudi Arabia and other Middle East nations announced, as the devastating war in Gaza casts a long shadow over festivities in the region.https://t.co/1hdwnANoTW pic.twitter.com/JV4mnsyYBm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: #芭比电影》主演美国-费雷拉（America Ferrera）、瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）、伊莎-蕾（Issa Rae）和刘思沐（Simu Liu）抵达 #奥斯卡颁奖典礼现场

item.title: 周日，印度藏人挥舞着祖国的国旗举行抗议活动，纪念中国镇压起义失败65周年：
item.description:
Tibetans in India waved the flag of their homeland on Sunday in protests marking 65 years since a failed uprising was crushed by China, driving the Dalai Lama and thousands of compatriots to flee.
More: https://t.co/A7XualnSFx pic.twitter.com/SctKXeNjB0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 周日，明尼苏达森林狼队中锋鲁迪-戈贝尔（Rudy Gobert）被 NBA 罚款 10 万美元，因为这位法国人对裁判做出了手势。
item.description:
Minnesota Timberwolves center Rudy Gobert was fined $100,000 by the NBA on Sunday after the Frenchman made a gesture against a referee.https://t.co/wpSffQnB1C

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 在欧洲最大的化学联合企业之一德国科思创集团（Covestro）中，该集团正在试验用糖代替石油作为基础材料生产一种关键产品，以减少该行业的碳足迹。➡️
item.description:
At one of Europe's largest chemical complexes, German group Covestro is trialling the manufacture of a key product using sugar as a base material instead of oil, as the industry seeks to reduce its carbon footprint. ➡️https://t.co/QT23V6BDJZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 我们正在好莱坞现场直播 #奥斯卡颁奖典礼。关注时尚、获奖者和任何惊喜。需要在节目开始前补习吗？以下是今晚值得关注的五件事

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克曾被认为在意识形态上不可识别，但最近几周，他利用自己的平台煽起了西方保守媒体和极右运动所珍视的主题。
item.description:
Once considered non-identifiable ideologically, Elon Musk has used his platform in recent weeks to stoke themes cherished by conservative media and far right movements across the West.https://t.co/FiKxDkGl0D

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 来自 #AFPSports：瓜迪奥拉（Pep Guardiola）表示，曼城队在周日的比赛中经历了利物浦队下半场的 "海啸"，最终以 1-1 战平对手，三队在英超联赛中的积分差距仅为 1 分。
item.description:

item.title: "功夫熊猫 4》（Kung Fu Panda 4）在本周末一举夺得票房冠军，而《沙丘》（Dune：据业内人士周日估计，《沙丘：第二部》成为今年首部国内票房突破 1.5 亿美元大关的影片。
item.description:
"Kung Fu Panda 4" chopped its way to the top of the box office this weekend while "Dune: Part Two" became the year's first film to pass the $150 million mark domestically, industry estimates showed Sunday.https://t.co/L36yaWBl3n

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 本周，成千上万的中国代表将齐聚一堂，参加一次重要的政治会议，VPN软件的一家主要供应商表示，VPN软件越来越难以绕过中国政府声名狼藉的防火墙。
item.description:
As thousands of Chinese delegates gather this week for a key political meeting, VPN software has increasingly struggled to circumvent Beijing's notorious firewall, a leading provider of the software said.https://t.co/KVVBDmDIAJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 一份新的行业报告称，尽管有《芭比娃娃》这样的成功影片，但去年由女性担任主角的好莱坞电影比例有所下降。📽️⬇️
item.description:
The share of Hollywood films with women in the lead role fell last year, a new industry report says, despite standout successes like "Barbie." 📽️⬇️https://t.co/cQDLTOzuOg pic.twitter.com/Q8o4yyXJiv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING MotoGP 世界卫冕冠军弗朗切斯科-巴尼亚（Francesco Bagnaia）赢得赛季揭幕战 #QatarGP

item.title: #法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）在周日发表的一篇访谈中表示，他的内阁将在下个月审议一项包含 "严格条件 "的 "协助死亡 "法案。
item.description:
#BREAKING French President Emmanuel Macron says in an interview published Sunday that his cabinet will consider an "assisted dying" bill including "strict conditions" next month pic.twitter.com/yTJ3XcQfZU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: ICYMI:🇸🇪瑞典本周成为北约第 32 个成员国，结束了这个斯堪的纳维亚国家在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后扭转了两个世纪以来不结盟路线的两年曲折外交。
item.description:
ICYMI: 🇸🇪Sweden this week became NATO's 32nd member, capping two years of tortuous diplomacy after the Scandinavian nation reversed course on two centuries of non-alignment in the wake of Russia's invasion of Ukraine.https://t.co/H519V5H0RF pic.twitter.com/DRgIEQP1d9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 来自 #AFPSports： 周日，美国滑雪运动员米卡拉-希弗林（Mikaela Shiffrin）在瑞典阿雷举行的女子大回转比赛中夺冠，这是她在世界杯上夺得的第 96 场胜利。这是她自 1 月底严重摔伤后复出的首场比赛。
item.description:
From #AFPSports: American skier Mikaela Shiffrin took home a record-extending 96th World Cup victory on Sunday with a win in the women's slalom in Are, Sweden. It was her first competition back since a heavy crash in late January.https://t.co/GlDV73yxb8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 🇺🇦"我们的旗帜是黄蓝相间的"：教皇发出 "白旗 "呼吁后，乌克兰官员誓言不向俄罗斯投降
item.description:
🇺🇦'Our flag is a yellow and blue one': Ukraine officials vow no surrender to Russia after Pope's 'white flag' call https://t.co/NY8Fxn3f9k

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 托特纳姆热刺队周日以 4-0 击败阿斯顿维拉队，在争夺英超前四名的战斗中取得了关键性的胜利。#AFPSports➡️

item.title: 新晋美国车手马特奥-约根森周日在自行车巴黎-尼斯赛中夺冠，为期八天的比赛在里维埃拉海滨的标志性步行道 Promenade des Anglais 上达到高潮。#AFPSports ➡️
item.description:
Up-and-coming American rider Matteo Jorgenson won cycling's Paris-Nice on Sunday as the eight day event culminated on the Riviera seafront along the iconic walkway the Promenade des Anglais. #AFPSports
➡️ https://t.co/lc7TTAZyUq pic.twitter.com/YD1h3bMQmo

item.title: 在爱尔兰队以 23-22 的比分惨败给英格兰队之后，贾米森-吉布森-帕克（Jamison Gibson-Park）坚定地表示，连续赢得六国赛冠军的前景仍然是爱尔兰队的 "巨大 "动力。#AFPSports➡️
item.description:
Jamison Gibson-Park was adamant the prospect of winning successive Six Nations titles remained a "massive" incentive for Ireland after their dreams of back-to-back Grand Slams were dashed by a dramatic 23-22 loss to England. #AFPSports
➡️ https://t.co/JXfWmGfNHm pic.twitter.com/LfkdfBkSve

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 在狂风暴雨席卷法国南部之后，法国救援人员周日正在搜寻包括两名儿童在内的七名失踪人员，据信其中大部分人是在被洪水淹没的桥梁上被汽车冲走的。➡️。
item.description:
French rescue workers were on Sunday searching for seven people, including two children, missing after violent storms swept the south of the country with most believed to have been swept away in cars on flooded bridges.
➡️ https://t.co/NDeKEnUqSy pic.twitter.com/YyWTbh1gjL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024
